data.text: @scott4670 I know that was the case w/ the Sars mRna vaccinne...this time it is people's. Pfizer testing isn't complete until 1-23 and Moderna 10-22...let's do the .ath folks, anybody taking the doses are the trial/test subjects. They allocated AI to  process the massive amts of data

@scott4670 I believe I saw that in the COVID animal trials in 2004 (or around that), 30% of the animals died after they were let back into the wild and encountered COVID again. Very scary. On current vaccines, I think they only tested mice. There was not a lot of testing done.
